title: Fix broken portfolio images by generating new images and updating component references

requirements.summary: Fix PortfolioGallery component to correctly reference all 120 portfolio images from frontend/public/assets/generated directory using proper public asset paths
acceptanceCriteria: All portfolio images use correct public asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/filename.png)
No broken image icons appear in any portfolio category
Image paths match the exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated
All 120 images (30 Home, 30 Commercial, 30 Office, 30 Hotels) render successfully

file_operations.description: Update the portfolio image data arrays to use public asset paths (/assets/generated/) instead of relative imports. Replace all image references with the correct public asset paths for all 120 generated images: home-1.dim_800x600.png through home-30.dim_800x600.png, commercial-1.dim_800x600.png through commercial-30.dim_800x600.png, office-1.dim_800x600.png through office-30.dim_800x600.png, and hotels-1.dim_800x600.png through hotels-30.dim_800x600.png. Ensure the image src attributes use the format /assets/generated/filename.png to properly reference the static assets in the public directory.

requirements.summary: Ensure portfolio image filenames match exact generated filenames using proper public asset paths without import statements
acceptanceCriteria: Component uses /assets/generated/ prefix for all image paths
Filenames follow the pattern: home-1.png through home-30.png, commercial-1.png through commercial-30.png, office-1.png through office-30.png, hotels-1.png through hotels-30.png
No import statements are used for portfolio images
All image references are string paths to public assets

file_operations.description: Remove any import statements for portfolio images and convert all image references to string literals using the /assets/generated/ prefix. Verify that filenames exactly match the generated files in frontend/public/assets/generated: home-1.dim_800x600.png through home-30.dim_800x600.png (not home-1.png), commercial-1.dim_800x600.png through commercial-30.dim_800x600.png, office-1.dim_800x600.png through office-30.dim_800x600.png, and hotels-1.dim_800x600.png through hotels-30.dim_800x600.png. All image paths must be string literals in the format /assets/generated/category-number.dim_800x600.png.

requirements.summary: Populate all 120 portfolio images with category-appropriate titles and descriptions across Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels categories
acceptanceCriteria: 30 Home category images with residential-appropriate titles and descriptions
30 Commercial category images with retail/restaurant/showroom titles and descriptions
30 Office category images with corporate workspace titles and descriptions
30 Hotels category images with luxury hospitality titles and descriptions
Each image entry includes a unique, descriptive title
Each image entry includes a detailed description appropriate to its category theme

file_operations.description: Expand the portfolio data structure to include all 120 images with complete metadata. For Home category: add 30 entries referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/home-1.dim_800x600.png through home-30.dim_800x600.png with titles like 'Luxurious Residential Living Room', 'Contemporary Bedroom Suite', 'Modern Kitchen Design', etc. For Commercial category: add 30 entries referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/commercial-1.dim_800x600.png through commercial-30.dim_800x600.png with titles for boutiques, restaurants, showrooms. For Office category: add 30 entries referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/office-1.dim_800x600.png through office-30.dim_800x600.png with corporate workspace titles. For Hotels category: add 30 entries referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/hotels-1.dim_800x600.png through hotels-30.dim_800x600.png with luxury hospitality titles. Each entry must include a descriptive title and detailed description matching the image generation prompts from the BuildRequest.
